results.title: Gas, food lodging
results.creator_credit: Allison Anders, Daniel Hassid, William Ewart, Seth Willenson and Cineville
results.brief_description: Set in Laramie, New Mexico, this film deals with the relationship between a single mother and her two teenage daughters, complicated by small town isolation. The film explores the notion of family as it tackles issues of love, death, sex and escape. Stars Brooke Adams, Ione Skye and Fairuza Balk in the lead roles. Cast also includes James Brolin, Robert Knepper, David Landsbury, Chris Mulkey and Donovan Leitch. Screenplay by Alison Anders, based on the novel ‘Don’t Look and It Won’t Hurt’ by Richard Peck. Edited by Tracy S. Granger. Photographed by Dean Lent. Music composed by J. Mascis.

results.title: Gas! or It became necessary to destroy the world in order to save it
results.creator_credit: San Jacinto Productions and Roger Corman
results.brief_description: When the military authorities release a noxious substance that causes “death from instant old age” in everyone over twenty-five, the youth of America are left to their own devices to invent a new world order. This black, totally zany film is one of Roger Corman’s triumphs as it captures a blend of acid rock, far-out humour and revolutionary politicking in the true spirit of the sixties and the Love Generation. Stars Robert Corff, Elaine Giftos, Ben Vereen and Cindy Williams and features music performed by Country Joe and the Fish.

results.title: Gas welding equipment
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Gas Welding”.
Part one of a series of nine short instructional films showing methods for oxyacetylene welding from setting-up procedures through flame adjustments. Shows types of welds, cutting methods and closing down procedures. Close-up viewing of the equipment and materials being worked gives the learner an operator’s perspective into the art of oxyacetylene welding.

results.brief_description: This film introduces gas welding step by step. The nine sections of the film deal with all stages of welding. Suitable for secondary level.

results.title: Gas turbine goes to sea
results.creator_credit: Shell Film Unit and Phillip Armitage
results.brief_description: Records the installation of the first marine gas turbine for an ocean-going vessel. Draws attention to the length of time taken for installation - three months, and the importance of further tests, when it is at sea. Concludes by pointing out that it will be a long time before the gas turbine takes it place with the steam engine and diesel engine, but the first steps have been taken.

results.title: Gas pressure and molecular collisions
results.creator_credit: Quentin Brown, Educational Services and Chemistry Educational Materials Study
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Chemical Education Material Study Series”.
Explores the relationship between gaseous pressure and molecular collisions. Studies the effects of varying the number of molecules per unit of volume and of varying the temperature. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Gas from Gippsland
results.creator_credit: Roy A. Driver and Herschells Films
results.brief_description: Describes the construction of the Brown Coal Gasification Plant at Morwell in Victoria’s Latrobe Valley. The Plant is designed to use the Lurgi High Pressure Gasification process and will be immediately capable of delivering 15 million cubic feet daily. Shows the laying of the 103 mile gas pipe-line to Melbourne and the official opening of the Plant by HRH the Duke of Edinburgh in December 1956.

results.title: Gas for home and industry
results.brief_description: Fuel gas as a source of energy in modern society. Compares the use of gas at the turn of the century with its present-day use for cooking, water heating, space heating and refrigeration. Production processes for three types of manufactured gas are described; coke oven gas, carburetted water gas and oil gas. Research work on improved methods of gas production is illustrated including the method based on the catalyst cracking process.
